import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import CardItem from './CardItem' import './Cart.css' class Cart extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { value: 1, } this.ref = React.createRef(); } addFunction = (val) => { this.setState({value: this.state.value+ 1}) console.log(val); }; subFunction = (val) => { this.setState({value: this.state.value- 1}) (this.state.value == 0)? this.setState({value: 0}): console.log(val); } render() { var productsForUser = []; alert(this.props.products[0]['productId']); console.log(this.props.user.cart[0]); for(var j=0; j ); return (
